content.question: A third block of the same mass as blocks 1 and 2 is attached to block 2 on the table, as shown in the figure. Using conservation of energy, the student repeats a derivation for the speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of block 1 when it has fallen a distance <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of g h, and denominator 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of g h, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext=" the square root of the fraction with numerator 2 g h, and denominator 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the square root of g h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext=" the square root of the fraction with numerator 3 g h, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext=" the square root of the fraction with numerator 2 g h, and denominator 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
